title: Check Jet Fuel Specification
description: A salesperson receives an inquiry from an airline for jet fuel. They need to confirm their product meets the required international specification (e.g., ASTM D1655).

tasks.description: Retrieve the internal product specification sheet for 'Jet A-1' fuel.
tasks.expected_outcome: The product spec sheet is displayed.

tasks.description: Compare the internal specification against the requirements of ASTM D1655, paying close attention to flash point and freeze point.
tasks.expected_outcome: The comparison confirms that the company's product meets all requirements of the ASTM standard.

tasks.description: Generate a Certificate of Quality (COQ) to send to the customer confirming compliance.
tasks.expected_outcome: A formal COQ document is created and ready to be sent.
